answers.answer: Hello.Neuropathy is a term used to describe conditions where the nerves are dysfunctional.A nerve (Neuron) is supposed to carry signals. There are motor neurons and sensory neurons. Depending upon the cause and severity, there are various symptoms of Neuropathy, such as, tingling (pins and needles sensation), numbness of the skin, burning sensation, etc.Some of the common causes of Neuropathy are Diabetes, infections, demyelinating disorders, nerve compression and vitamin deficiency.Do you have any symptoms ?Regards
